Reviews.Title: Did not work on AT&T;'s network
Reviews.Author: John McCoy
Reviews.Content: This phone did not work on the AT&T; network using my postpaid SIM card.  I took it to the AT&T; store and they couldn't make it work either.  It's not clear if this was an issue with this particular phone, or if this model doesn't work on AT&T;'s network.It appeared to be some sort of European domestic market phone, as the charger connects to house current with a Euro-style two-pronged "snakebite" connector, and the package included a Euro-to-US adapter.  Instruction manuals, etc. were in English.It seemed like a neat little phone for $50, and from the limited time I spent messing with the software, it seemed fine.  But, no network connection, no use.  The phone is now returned to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: good phone but not really unlocked
Reviews.Author: JDM
Reviews.Content: The phone was purchased as "unlocked" but like another purchaser I received a locked phone from a South African mobile company.  It would never accept the sim because it wasn't from vodacom.  So, I had to return to Amazon.  It was disappointing that the reseller continues to sell"unlocked" phones that really aren't. The phone's features were everything I expected and great to travel with overseas. It is not a smart phone but its Blackberry-like features will serve your basic needs.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: lmnop
Reviews.Content: i am beyond happy with this purchase. i am going abroad for 2+ months and was looking for a phone with a qwerty keyboard that i could use with a sim from greece. after doing my research i purchased this phone and it came much faster than expected. not only did i get a brand new phone that exceeded my expectations but also a european converter which i didnt expect at all. would buy again a million times.

Reviews.Title: does not work!
Reviews.Author: PJ
Reviews.Content: This phone does not work either with AT&T; or T-Mobile, although the product description claims that it is a unlocked GSM phone. When I turn on the phone, Vodacom logo, a South African telecom company, appears. It makes me seriously doubt that it is indeed unlocked.I like the phone per se because it is easy to use (i.e., typing/texting). But if it does not work, as claimed by the seller, it is useless. I thank Amazon for allowing me to return it.

Reviews.Title: Non functional
Reviews.Author: Mark Haugen
Reviews.Content: The phone worked great for about a month.I then started having trouble getting a network.AT&T; had no idea how to solve the problem.The next problem was that I could receive texes, but when I respondined and sent them the person they were sent to never received them. ( must be floating around in outer space).Great design and easy to use, to bad it did not continue to operate as it should have.

Reviews.Title: nice cell
Reviews.Author: royj
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone unlocked for a gift and are very happy with it. Although not a smartphone meets well the function for which it was made and it have good price. I recommend it for anyone looking for a walk without great pretensions unlocked cell.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: jklauser
Reviews.Content: I live in Argentina and needed a simple phone with QWERTY keyboard for texting. It is truly unlocked and workes just great with any carrier!

Reviews.Title: Does not work with AT&T;
Reviews.Author: coffee
Reviews.Content: When I put in my AT&T; SIM card the phone would not work. Despite the description, the phone isn't an AT&T; phone. It didn 't come with instructions and the battery was damaged.

Reviews.Title: good but the reception signals turned off intermittenly
Reviews.Author: Chin T. Tan
Reviews.Content: Thanks to Amazon for letting me return the cellphone. The problem with this cellphone is that the reception signals went off intermittently during the day, even in the area where the coverage is excellent. (Note: I am using T-mobile network).Not sure what caused it. Anyway, will keep on looking for good quality budgeted cellphones.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Nestor Alfonzo
Reviews.Content: I just took out the chip card of my old phone and put it in the new phone, which started to work perfectly inmediately.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung E2220 Black Keyboard Unlocked GSM QuadBand Bar Cell Phone
